bill.summary:
Beneficiary Travel Act of 2017
This bill directs the Department of Veterans Affairs to report annually on the total payments and allowances made for beneficiary travel per state and the amount of any increase or decrease in such amounts from the previous year.
Savings resulting from any decrease shall be transferred to the Veterans Choice Fund.
